ozpIwc.LocksApi Class

Extends ozpIwc.CommonApiBase
Defined in: app/js/bus/api/locks/locksApi.js:5
Module: bus.api.Type
Parent Module: bus.service

The Locks Api. Treats each node as an individual mutex, creating a queue to access/own the resource. Subclasses the ozpIwc.CommonApiBase. Utilizes the ozpIwc.LocksNode which subclasses the ozpIwc.CommonApiValue.

Constructor

ozpIwc.LocksApi

()

Defined in app/js/bus/api/locks/locksApi.js:5

Methods

cleanup

()

Defined in app/js/bus/api/locks/locksApi.js:116

Iterates over all node's and cleans out any rouge locks queue'd for no-longer/non-existent addresses.

  • config
)

Defined in app/js/bus/api/locks/locksApi.js:63

The Locks Api uses the Bully Consensus module to determine leadership.

ozpIwc.DataNode:

handleConsensusState

(
  • state
)

Defined in app/js/bus/api/locks/locksApi.js:146

When the Consensus Module changes state, the Locks Api behaves differently. It's participant will only send outbound messages if it is the "Coordinator".

Parameters:

  • state String

(

Defined in app/js/bus/api/locks/locksApi.js:167

()

Defined in app/js/bus/api/locks/locksApi.js:197

Shuts down the api, issuing a deathscream and releasing the lock, if possible.
